text:
#VETERANS: Sign up to stay informed about getting a #COVID19 #vaccine at @DeptVetAffairs 

NOTE: VA will contact every eligible Veteran in each risk group. You do not have to sign up anywhere in order to get a vaccine; this link is just to #stayinformed.

https://t.co/bGeRapvG41 https://t.co/pi7UY35f3Q
